settings.heading: Samsung DeX
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts paired with Samsung DeX takes your workflow to the next level by creating a complete desktop experience out of your Galaxy phone or tablet. So, what is Samsung Dex? Samsung DeX is a new software platform used for mobile-powered desktop computing that allows you to turn your phone or tablet into a work-ready PC. With the help of an external monitor, the platform can mirror programs and access files from the device. Now that Samsung has turned your mobile device into a true pocket PC, it's time to think on-the-go. With a new world of possibilities within reach, RAM® Mounts and GDS® Technology™ enable you to secure this cutting edge technology in your vehicle, on your forklift, in the office, or virtually anywhere else.

settings.heading: Samsung DeX + GDS® Technology™
settings.copy: GDS® Technology™ takes your Samsung DeX connection one step further using reliable docking stations with pogo pin technology—no cords needed. With multiple desktop and vehicle solutions to choose from, GDS® Docks™ will support any device wrapped in an IntelliSkin®. IntelliSkin® is a protective sleeve for your devices with military-grade drop protection and converts the device's internal charging port to the rugged pogo pads for any GDS® Dock™. This technology keeps your device protected in the most rugged environments, as well as a secure connection to the platform at all times.

settings.heading: Samsung DeX + RAM® Mounts
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts are best known for offering the most rugged and reliable mounting solutions for any industrial environment. With a full line of modular and adjustable components, RAM® lets you build out a customized system that suits your specific needs. With a range of ball & socket sizes to accommodate specific devices and environments, RAM® Mounts unlock the full potential of Samsung's platform. Secure your monitor, keyboard, phone, or tablet exactly where you want them, with peace of mind that they will remain secure under the most demanding environments.

settings.heading: Samsung DeX + GDS® View™
settings.copy: The GDS® View™ 13.3" touchscreen monitor lets you take the PC experience on the road. Create a Samsung DeX in-vehicle mobile workstation that takes advantage of the GDS® Ecosystem™ for connecting peripherals and charging capabilities. The GDS® View™ monitor has undergone MIL-STD-810G 514.5 vibration testing, ensuring performance in the most demanding environments. This two-point capacitive touchscreen monitor allows you to pinch, zoom, and select – and includes an anti-glare and anti-fingerprint treatment.

settings.heading: Universal Vehicle Bundle
settings.copy: RAM® Mounts offers a turnkey solution to Samsung DeX in-vehicle with the GDS® Ecosystem™ Bundle. Comprised of a full 13.3" touchscreen monitor, keyboard, phone mount, vehicle base and proper cables the GDS® Ecosystem™ Bundle is an instant mobile workstation—all you need is your compatible Samsung phone. The RAM® No-Drill™ vehicle base is a universal base for a wide variety of vehicles as opposed to our vehicle-specific custom bases. For those looking for a get-it-and-go mobile workstation, the GDS® Ecosystem™ bundle makes it easy to start using the platform in your vehicle instantly with no hassle and an easy install.
